description: Allows the source Amazon OpenSearch Service domain owner to delete an existing outbound cross-cluster search connection. For more information, see Cross-cluster search for Amazon OpenSearch Service.

parameters.name: ConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the outbound connection you want to permanently delete.

nested_items.name: Connection
nested_items.description: The deleted inbound connection.

nested_items.name: LocalDomainInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the source (local) domain.

nested_items.name: AWSDomainInformation
nested_items.description: Information about an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the domain owner.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: Name of the domain.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which the domain is located.

nested_items.name: RemoteDomainInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the destination (remote) domain.

nested_items.name: AWSDomainInformation
nested_items.description: Information about an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the domain owner.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: Name of the domain.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which the domain is located.

nested_items.name: ConnectionId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of the connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectionAlias
nested_items.description: Name of the connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectionStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the connection.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: The status code for the outbound connection. Can be one of the following:

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Verbose information for the outbound connection.

nested_items.name: ConnectionMode
nested_items.description: The connection mode.

nested_items.name: ConnectionProperties
nested_items.description: Properties for the outbound connection.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of the remote domain. Applicable for VPC_ENDPOINT connection mode.

nested_items.name: CrossClusterSearch
nested_items.description: The connection properties for cross cluster search.

nested_items.name: SkipUnavailable
nested_items.description: The status of the SkipUnavailable setting for the outbound connection. This feature allows you to specify some clusters as optional and ensure that your cross-cluster queries return partial results despite failures on one or more remote clusters.
